sql: CREATE TABLE `tags_to_tasks` (`tag_id` text NOT NULL,`task_id` text NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY(`tag_id`, `task_id`),FOREIGN KEY (`tag_id`) REFERENCES `tags`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade,FOREIGN KEY (`task_id`) REFERENCES `tasks`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade);

CREATE TABLE `tags` (`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,`label` text NOT NULL,`created_at` integer DEFAULT (strftime('%f', 'now') * 1000) NOT NULL,`updated_at` integer DEFAULT (strftime('%f', 'now') * 1000) NOT NULL,`deleted_at` integer);

CREATE TABLE `tasks` (`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,`title` text NOT NULL,`summary` text DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,`created_at` integer DEFAULT (strftime('%f', 'now') * 1000) NOT NULL,`updated_at` integer DEFAULT (strftime('%f', 'now') * 1000) NOT NULL,`deleted_at` integer);

CREATE TABLE `__new_tags` (`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,`label` text NOT NULL,`created_at` integer DEFAULT (round(strftime('%f', 'now') * 1000)) NOT NULL,`updated_at` integer DEFAULT (round(strftime('%f', 'now') * 1000)) NOT NULL,`deleted_at` integer);

CREATE TABLE `__new_tasks` (`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,`title` text NOT NULL,`summary` text DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,`created_at` integer DEFAULT (round(strftime('%f', 'now') * 1000)) NOT NULL,`updated_at` integer DEFAULT (round(strftime('%f', 'now') * 1000)) NOT NULL,`deleted_at` integer);

CREATE TABLE `__new_tags` (`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,`label` text NOT NULL,`created_at` integer DEFAULT ((strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) + (strftime('%f', 'now') % 1 * 1000)) NOT NULL,`updated_at` integer DEFAULT ((strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) + (strftime('%f', 'now') % 1 * 1000)) NOT NULL,`deleted_at` integer);

CREATE TABLE `__new_tasks` (`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,`title` text NOT NULL,`summary` text DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,`created_at` integer DEFAULT ((strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) + (strftime('%f', 'now') % 1 * 1000)) NOT NULL,`updated_at` integer DEFAULT ((strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) + (strftime('%f', 'now') % 1 * 1000)) NOT NULL,`deleted_at` integer);
